entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
